name: European Association for the Study of Diabetes e.V.
bossPosition: Managing Director and Chief Medical Officer
membership: The Alliance for Biomedical Research in Europe (BioMed Alliance) http://www.biomedeurope.org/
memberOrga: EASD is based on individual Membership
goal: The aims of the Association are to encourage and support research in the field of diabetes, the rapid diffusion of acquired knowledge and to facilitate its application. The Association is based on individual membership and embraces scientists, physicians, laboratory workers, nurses and students from all over the world who are interested in diabetes and related subjects. It is governed by a Council and an Executive Committee chaired by the President.
interests: Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Implement an EASD awareness campaign for diabetes research vis-à-vis the European Commission and European Parliament

- Influence legislative dossiers affecting Diabetes (e.g. medical devices Regulation)

- Establish or strengthen collaboration with key EASD stakeholders active in the field of diabetes
